summary: This mod makes all pickaxes and woodcutter axes weigh 3 instead of 10. This includes unique tools like the poachers axe and notched pickaxe.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes all pickaxes and woodcutter axes weigh 3 instead of 10. This includes unique tools like the poachers axe and notched pickaxe.

I always like to carry a pickaxe and woodcutters axe with me, but they are way too heavy. It was easy enough to change the weight, so I did. I still didn't want them to way nothing, but I felt like they were really weighing me down.

No DLC required.
author: chasewj1
